title: 5 Clever Ways to Use a Bar of Soap in Your Garden
description:

title: Use Your Duvet Cover as a Summer Bedspread
description:
Sleeping in the summer heat can be pretty miserable. Of course, having air conditioning helps tremendously, but if you’re feeling hot when you go to bed, falling and staying asleep can be hard—especially if you’re a hot sleeper.

title: These Are the Best U.S. Cities to Live in Without a Car
description:
